message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its value and quality, we believe it's worth more than $120 to you. Considering its exceptional features and benefits, I propose a special introductory price of $150 for you today. This offer includes a 1-month free upgrade on any future updates. Please let me know if this works for you, or if there's a better price point you're considering. I'm confident you'll find the product invaluable.
